SPI_FxnTable_s Struct Reference
SPI Driver » SPI Driver API

The definition of a SPI function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific SPI driver implementation. More...

#include <SPI.h>

Detailed Description

The definition of a SPI function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific SPI driver implementation.

Field Documentation

SPI_CloseFxn SPI_FxnTable_s::closeFxn

Function to close the specified peripheral

SPI_ControlFxn SPI_FxnTable_s::controlFxn

Function to implementation specific control function

SPI_OpenFxn SPI_FxnTable_s::openFxn

Function to open the specified peripheral

SPI_ServiceISRFxn SPI_FxnTable_s::serviceISRFxn

Function to service the SPI instance

SPI_InitFxn SPI_FxnTable_s::spiInitFxn

Function to initialize the given data object

SPI_TransferCancelFxn SPI_FxnTable_s::transferCancelFxn

Function to cancel SPI data transfer

SPI_TransferFxn SPI_FxnTable_s::transferFxn

Function to initiate a SPI data transfer
